page.title: 19LOCAL SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: We did a shopping survey in{Sheriff {Hill.}We found that there was no major shopping centre in this square. All the shops are small mainly family businesses. The shops are in several main types:- a) Shops selling goods to people - these sell ordinary things that people need every day -there are 10 of these shops including 6 grocers. b) shops selling services - these provide personal services which people need, such as hairdressing. There are only 4 of these including one video hire shop. c) Fast food shops - there is 1 fish and chip shop and one Chinese take- away shop. d) There are centres of entertainment - 4 public houses and a gymnasium. e) Ther are also businesses - there is a scrapyard and a builders yard.
